tag: {display:{Name:'{"translate":"ms.skill.003","fallback":"逆向追踪","italic":false,"color":"#5599FF"}',Lore:['[{"text":"⏲ 70s  ▶ 10s~30s","italic":false,"color":"#7367F0"}]','{"translate":"ms.skill.003.desc.a","fallback":"即刻高亮灵魂守卫者；守卫者距离你越近","italic":false,"color":"white"}','{"translate":"ms.skill.003.desc.b","fallback":"则效果越强，且可能会使其移速 -30%","italic":false,"color":"white"}']},HideFlags:63,CustomModelData:71003}
